values:
OK well I just weighed myself.. I weigh 150 exactly (as usual).... I have I think 13.5 weeks until high school starts (or 96 days) . So, I want to lose 15 lbs by August 20, getting me down to 135. In theory I should be able to do it, but I know I am going to have to work VERY VERY VERY hard. Mom says I can join WW again, which I think will definately help. I also signed up for tennis lessons and two volleyball camps, followed by volleyball practice for the Freshman team at HS, which I will hopefully make. So, yeah. 
I am a bit confused about J. I mean, I really think that I have no chance with him... how he (or any other guy for that matter) could like me is totally above my head. I don't want to put my heart on the line right now, so I decided that I'm gonna try to move on. I explained it Hannah like this: " It's not because I don't like him. It's because I like him SO much that I don't want to go on liking him in secret, torturing myself." 
I really think that if he is to be mine, it will happen in God's time... whenever that is. I see us as soul mates, for some reason. But right now, I don't think it is the best time. I have self - esteem and eating issues and I don't need a guy right now to complicate matters. I plan on coming back to high school, and getting his attention right then and there... 8.20.03 . :) 
So, yeah, that's my life right now. Welcome to my world.

um I had to delete this. because I think my parents are looking... err yea. so, email me if you want to know what josh day is.
--
Yeah, so, I had an okay day today. Hannah and I rehashed old memories .. and decided we NEVER wanted to play 'Hide and Go Seek, WOW!' LMAO .. it's hide and go seek with a twist, I suppose, and Kristen was making fun of us. :( Heh.

hey folks... it's Judy.
Becky helped sign me up... nice of her. :o)
 

so yeah. I don't really feel like writing at the moment, though.. so I'll check in tomorrow or Tues..

BUT!

I CAN'T WAIT FOR JOSHDAY! MONDAY IS JOSHDAY TUESDAY IS JOSHDAY AND WEDNESDAY IS JOSHDAY! THURSDAY AND FRIDAY TOO! 

lol uh.. yeah ;)
